events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where another vehicle collided with my rear bumper unexpectedly.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and police statement.
An agent specializing in auto insurance claims has been assigned to handle the investigation of this accident.
Your claim regarding the vehicle collision has been acknowledged and is now being processed.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage and a copy of the police report to proceed with the claim.
All requested documents including the police report and damage images have been submitted successfully.
The assigned agent has started an official investigation into the details and circumstances of the accident.
Investigation concluded that the other driver was at fault, and all evidence supports the claim validity.
A settlement offer to cover the repair costs and rental car expenses has been proposed to the claimant.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and thanked the company for timely handling.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims department and is now ready for payment processing.
Payment for the approved claim was successfully issued and transferred to the policyholder's bank account.
The claim file has been closed following full settlement and payment, with no outstanding issues remaining.
All documents and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived according to policy.
